string.value: Through #p2071010#'s request, I returned #t4031430# to #b#p2091001##k of #b#m250000000##k. Now I better borrow #b#t4031431##k from him...
#p2091001# decided to lend me #t4031431:#, in exchange for #b#t4031432:##k. #t4031432# can be apparently found at #r#o5120506##k...\n\n#t4031432# #b#c4031432##k/1

Thank you for returning #t4031430# to me... now, do you still need me for something? What? #p2071010# wants you to borrow #t4031431# for him? Well, I can certainly lend it to you, but ... if you can do me a favor, then I'll lend it to you.
Hey! You're the one that got me the Yeti Keychain last time! Since you're here again, I'm guessing you have some new dolls for me, right?
I am afraid I can't lend you #t4031431# if you do not wish to help me out here.
Oh, you found #t4031432#! Incredible! #o5120506# is really hard to tackle, because it has the secret art of an old master.

Now that you have brought #t4031432#, it's time for me to give you #t4031431#, but... hold on one second. One of my other students borrowed #t4031431#, so I'll have to get that back first. I've been waiting for this for a while, but now I'll finally be able to read #t4031432#...
It seems like you have not acquired #b#t4031432##k, yet. I'll need that if you want me to give you #t4031431#.
